name: The Gap (2017)
description:
A simple 2D platformer where you goal is to get over the gap and touch the flag on the other side. This game is a mixture of platforming skills and downright trolling.
This game supports the use of an Xbox controller as well as the traditional mouse and keyboard.
Sadly, while designing this game I didn't realize that Macs have a 16:10 aspect ratio so there are currently no builds for Macs. This may change in the future, but for now there are only builds for Windows.
This is my first real attempt at making a complete Unity game. I made this game to learn the Unity game engine and to teach myself C#. I learned so much while creating this game and the skills I acquired will help with future projects :)
